verses.verse: When He looked up, He saw the rich people throwing their contributions into the treasury vault.
He also saw a certain needy widow throwing two tiny coins there.
And He said, "I truly tell you that the widow, this poor one, threw in more than everyone.
You see, for the contributions of God, absolutely all these people threw in from what they had left over, but this widow from her deficiency threw in absolutely all the livelihood that she had."
And as some were telling about the temple grounds, that it had been decorated with nice stones and donations, He said,
"For these things that you see, days will come in which a stone will not be left on a stone that will not be torn down."
They asked Him, saying, "Teacher, so when will these things be, and what is the indicator when these things are going to be happening?"
Jesus said, "Look out. You should not be misled. You see, many will come based on My name, saying, 'I am Him,' and, 'The appointed time has come near.' So do not travel off behind them.
When you hear wars and conflicts, do not be scared. You see, it is necessary for these things to happen first, but the conclusion is not right away."
At that time, He was saying to them, "A nation will rise up on a nation and an empire on an empire.
There will be both huge earthquakes and throughout places, famines and diseases. There will be both fearful things and huge indicators out of heaven.
Before all these things, they will put their hands on you and persecute you, turning you in to synagogues and jails being led before kings and leaders on account of My name.
It will step out to you for a witness.
So place into your hearts not to be concerned beforehand to defend yourself.
You see, I will give you a mouth and insight that all the people lying in opposition to you will not be able to talk in opposition, nor stand in opposition to.
You will even be turned in by parents, brothers, relatives, and friends. And they will put some from among you to death.
And you will be hated by everyone because of My name.
And a hair from your head will not in any way be ruined.
Get your souls in your persistence to do what is right.
When you see Jerusalem being surrounded by army camps, at that time know that her uninhabitedness has come near.
At that time, the people in Judea must escape into the mountains, the people in the middle of her must get a ways out, and the people in the rural areas must not go into her
because these are days of retaliation, of the 'to accomplish all the things that have been written' kind.
What a tragedy it will be to the women having a baby in their womb and the women nursing in those days. You see, there will be a huge shortage on the earth and punishment in this ethnic group.

And they will fall by the edge of a knife and will be forcibly incarcerated into all the nations. And Jerusalem will be traipsed by non-Jews till the appointed times of the non-Jews will be accomplished.
And indicators will be in the sun, moon, and constellations. And on the earth, nations will be distressed with perplexity of the sea and surge reverberating
as people stop breathing out of fear and expectation of the events coming on the civilized world. You see, the abilities of the heavens will be disturbed.
And at that time, they will see the Son of the Person coming in a cloud with much ability and magnificence.
As these events begin to be happening, stand upright and raise your heads up because your paid release is near."
And He told an illustration to them, "Look at the fig tree and all the trees.
When they already thrust sprouts forward, as you see out from yourselves, you know that the summer is already near.
In this way also, when you see these things happening, know that the empire of God is near.
Amen, I tell you that this generation will not in any way pass until all these things happen.
The sky and the earth will pass, but My messages will not in any way pass.
Pay attention to yourselves so that your hearts might not be heavy with a hangover, drunkenness, and worry about this life's things, and that day might stand over you unexpected.
You see, it will come as a trap on all the people sitting on the face of all the earth.

So don't go to sleep, pleading in every right time so that you might be considered deserving to escape from all these things that are going to be happening and to be established in front of the Son of the Person."
During the days, He was on the temple grounds teaching. During the nights, going out, He was spending the nights outside in the mountain, the one that is called "of Olives."
And the entire group was coming to Him at daybreak on the temple grounds to be listening to Him.
